-- chelseatops --
I used a free-ware program called Time Adjuster. I downloaded the subtitle from allsubs.org and used the functions split, syncronize and convert in Time Adjuster. Just google it and you'll find the program.
can't believe why there are so few seeders for this great movie ( or at least this is what I get told)
